messages.title: Julian Huppert - the best choice for Cambridge
messages.content: As our MP, Julian had a strong record of delivering real improvements for Cambridge. On health, Julian gained an extra £20 million for local NHS services and secured funding to get Papworth Hospital moved to the city's Addenbrooke's site. On schools, he fought to win an additional £23.2 million every year to help Cambridgeshire children. On transport, Julian successfully fought for the new Cambridge North station and Chisholm Trail cycle and pedestrian route. With your support he can continue his hard work to bring more benefits for Cambridge residents.

messages.title: Back Julian for an MP who will:
messages.content: 1. Oppose Brexit and protect EU citizens. 2. Invest properly in our NHS. 3. Protect funding for local schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Hundreds of local jobs rely heavily on Britain’s access to the single market. That’s why Julian is clear that Britain must remain in the heart of the world’s largest trade market. Julian will work to protect EU citizens’ rights and stop them being treated as a bargaining chip.

To properly support nurses, doctors, and patients, Julian and the Lib Dems will invest an extra £6 billion a year, funded by a 1 penny income tax increase. This is the only way to tackle the current crisis and lead to better services locally, rather than proposed cuts.

Children deserve a first-class education. That is why Julian’s Lib Dems will reverse Conservative cuts, providing £7 billion for schools and colleges. This would mean no Cambridge school would need to make teachers or teaching assistants redundant, nor reduce lessons.

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose Brexit and protect EU citizens. Send Theresa May a strong anti-Brexit message.
issues.education: Protect funding for local schools. Julian fought to win an additional £23.2 million every year to help Cambridgeshire children. That is why Julian’s Lib Dems will reverse Conservative cuts, providing £7 billion for schools and colleges.
issues.health: Invest properly in our NHS. Julian gained an extra £20 million for local NHS services and secured funding to get Papworth Hospital moved to the city’s Addenbrooke’s site. To properly support nurses, doctors, and patients, Julian and the Lib Dems will invest an extra £6 billion a year, funded by a 1 penny income tax increase.
issues.immigration: Julian will work to protect EU citizens’ rights and stop them being treated as a bargaining chip.
issues.transport: Julian successfully fought for the new Cambridge North station and Chisholm Trail cycle and pedestrian route.

community.content: Julian, who grew up here in Cambridge, gained widespread praise as our MP for his tireless work securing more funding for local schools and health services.

quotes.text: Corbyn’s weak opposition allowed Theresa May an easy ride on Brexit.
Jeremy Corbyn has aligned the Labour Party with UKIP.
